settings: {"color.categorical_palette":["#66c5cc","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4","#bef0f4"],"hierarchy_layout":"circlePacking","label_case":"bottomUpperCase","label_color":"#595959","label_weight":"bottomBold","layout.footer_logo_enabled":true,"layout.footer_logo_src":"","layout.footer_note":"註：政府或公營機構服務費用等不可以消費券支付，提供本地及非本地課程的中小學，以及大學教育資助委員會資助的大學，以及醫院管理局均不接受消費券","layout.footer_note_secondary":"","layout.header_logo_enabled":true,"layout.header_logo_height":4.5,"layout.header_logo_src":"https://i.imgur.com/IGfOlUB.png","layout.source_label":"數據來源：","layout.source_name":"政府統計處《2019/20年住戶開支統計調查》","layout.subtitle":"以下均為每月平均數字；假設在5個月內將5,000元消費券月畢，即平均每月1,000元","layout.title":"市民每人到手消費券金額 VS 市民日常開支","layout.title_size":"2","layout.title_styling":true,"number_formatter.advanced":true,"number_formatter.strip_separator":false,"number_formatter.suffix":"元","stroke_color":null}
